20101209071736.000|20101209071741.000|CCO|DEVELOP DURING THE PRESIDENCY,
20101209071741.000|20101209071743.500|CCO|INSPIRED BY HIS OWN INSTINCTS,
20101209071743.500|20101209071746.000|CCO|BY 1910 AND 1911 AND 1912, IT
20101209071746.000|20101209071748.500|CCO|WAS FORMIDABLE.
20101209071748.500|20101209071751.000|CCO|THAT IS ONE OF THE REASONS HE
20101209071751.000|20101209071753.500|CCO|FELT TO COME PELT -- TO LEAVE
20101209071753.500|20101209071756.000|CCO|THEM.
20101209071756.000|20101209071758.500|CCO|THE TEA PARTY IS UNIFIED IN A
20101209071758.500|20101209071801.000|CCO|WAY THAT THEY ARE EQUALLY
20101209071801.000|20101209071803.000|CCO|PASSIONATE, EQUALLY ANGRY AND
20101209071803.000|20101209071805.000|CCO|THEY ALSO FEEL EXCLUDED.
20101209071805.000|20101209071807.000|CCO|THE DIFFERENCE IS THE
20101209071807.000|20101209071809.000|CCO|PROGRESSIVES OF 100 YEARS AGO

20101209071816.000|20101209071818.500|CCO|CLASS.
20101209071818.500|20101209071821.000|CCO|THERE WERE MIDDLE-OF-THE-ROAD
20101209071821.000|20101209071826.000|CCO|MIDDLE CLASS WHITES.

20101209072007.667|20101209072011.000|CCO|TAVIS: THANK YOU FOR RESPONDING.
20101209072011.000|20101209072013.500|CCO|HOW OFTEN DOES ONE WHO WAS BORN

20101209072024.333|20101209072026.000|CCO|>> IT WAS A LUXURY TO WRITE
